short_summary: MOJO MINI Rack system for STT (Terminal, Satellite Communications )
description: MOJO MINI Rack system for STT (Terminal, Satellite Communications) with delivery at 1941 Robertson Road Bells Corners, Nepean, Ottawa.
full_summary:
**Public Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Contract Title and Reference Number

* **Contract Title**: Mini Mojo
* **Reference Number**: CB-8706-21900779

### Amendment and Solicitation Information

* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247780/B

### Tender Overview

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is part of a contracting process governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The Department of National Defence (`DND`) is seeking to acquire a MOJO MINI Rack system from an eligible bidder.

### Proposal Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (`GD`)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (`RFP`)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-09-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

### Product Specifications and Delivery Details

The Ministry is seeking a MOJO MINI Rack system to support satellite communications (`STT`) at a National Capital Region location.

* **Product Code**: NSN 5895-01-691-6505
* **Delivery Address**: 1941 Robertson Road, Nepean, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0C2

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence (`DND`)
* **Contact Person**: Annick Barabé
* **Contact Email**: annick.barabe@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (819) 939-5900

### Attachments

The full tender document, including any amendments, can be accessed at the following URLs:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/8706/w8485-247780-mojo-mini-rfq.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/8706/w8485-247780-amend-001.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/8706/w8485-247780-mojo-mini-rfq-%28fr.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/8706/w8485-247780-amend-001.pdf
